## Fixed

- Fixed GUI state reset after page refresh by hydrating from `/api/state` on initial load, so the page no longer falls back to the initial config view unexpectedly. / 通过页面首次加载时从 `/api/state` 回填状态，修复了刷新后 GUI 回到初始配置页的问题。
- Fixed duplicate or drifting polling behavior across phase transitions by making poller scheduling idempotent per phase. / 通过按阶段幂等调度轮询器，修复了阶段切换时轮询重复或漂移的问题。

## Changed

- Changed GUI refresh behavior to fully follow server-side phase (`config` / `connecting` / `running` / `error`) for consistent recovery after reload. / 调整 GUI 刷新后的恢复逻辑，完全以服务端阶段状态（`config` / `connecting` / `running` / `error`）为准。
- Changed config code input persistence to session-only storage (`sessionStorage`) and clear-on-submit/stop to balance usability and safety. / 将配置码输入改为会话级存储（`sessionStorage`），并在提交成功或断开后清空，兼顾可用性与安全性。
- Changed error view to display `error_code` when present, improving troubleshooting visibility without changing external APIs. / 错误页在存在时展示 `error_code`，提升排障可见性，同时不改变对外 API。
